head.supplied: Dear Sir ¶ ¶ I have recently received your consignment of seeds with thanks. Herewith a few plants. The fruits of No. 53 are eaten by the Aborigines. ¶ ¶ At the same time I am sending you some of th...

div.p: RB MSS M1, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

MS is a postcard addressed to 'the Gov. Botanist | Baron F. von Mueller | Melbourne P. O. | Victoria'. It bears a postal imprint on the front from Kopperamana, SA, dated 2 April 1883. Kopperamana was a Lutheran Mission Station at Cooper Creek. A stamp on the reverse indicates that it was received at the Melbourne Post Office on 20 April 1883. Geehrter Herr,

Ihre Zusendung v. Sämereien habe ich jüngst dankend erhalten. Beifolgend etl. Pflanzen. Die Früchte v. No 53 werden v. den Eingebornen gegessen. — Sende Ihnen zugleich etwas von dem gewünschten Samen des Grases Panicum reversum, ist aber leider vermischt mit dem Samen eines gewissen Krautes, konnte ihn nicht rein erhalten.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
I have recently received your consignment of seeds with thanks. Herewith a few plants. The fruits of No. 53 are eaten by the Aborigines.
Flierl's specimen is at MEL 0592976, filed under Cucumis melo.
At the same time I am sending you some of the desired seeds of the grass Panicum reversum , but it is unfortunately mixed up with seeds of a particular herb. I could not obtain it pure.
